snippet: The English composer Gustav Holst’s orchestral suite “The Planets” was wedded with imagery of the solar system at a Summertime Classics concert by the New York Philharmonic.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews The Planets--an HD Odyssey, rendition of Gustav Holst's orchestral suite The Planets performed by the New York Philharmonic and accompanied by high-definition images of the solar system, at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The English composer Gustav Holst’s orchestral suite “The Planets” was wedded with imagery of the solar system at a Summertime Classics concert by the New York Philharmonic.

headline.seo: New York Philharmonic’s ‘The Planets’ Builds on Holst’s Work
headline.main: Spinning Through Space, With Help From NASA
headline.print_headline: Spinning Through Space, With Help From NASA
